name: Merge Up!
description:
Merge Up!

There once was an almighty being who ruled over all creatures


His power was so overwhelming that all races conspired to overrule him.

Their plan was successful and they managed to split the all mighty demon into many weak humanoid creatures

Every single creature was incarcerated in dungeons left to dead. Or so they thought......

Until one day the newly born creatures discovered that they could recover their strength and powers little by little by touching and merging into one....

Merge with all parts of you to become once again the strongest creature there is!!
